files.patch:
@@ -349,1 +349,5 @@
-            IOUtils.exec(pb, false, null, true, Executor.INFINITE_TIMEOUT);
+            new RetryExecutor()
+                .setMaxAttemptsCount(10)
+                .setAttemptTimeoutMillis(3000)
+                .setWriteOutputToFile(true)
+                .execute(pb);
